reviews.review:
Infinity War was brilliant, and don't worry even though it has more than 50 characters they all get their moments it was so much fun watching them fight all together

and even though the title says Avengers, it's clearly a THANOS movie, and probably the best character in this film and has the most screen time, and Josh Brolin did an amazing job on portraying Thanos.

The character development is great, except for the children of Thanos which disappoint me a little bit cause they didnt have that much development and screentime but that was expected since there's a lot of characters in this film.

CGI was great! it almost feel like it was real.

there are some scenes that feels like there's too much going on, and like moving to different scenes or places but overall the action sequences were amazing and even the movie is just 2 and half hours, it didnt feel like it was.

the movie is just so brilliant and emotional, 10 years of hard work. it paid off. the ending was definitely shocking, it'll leave you speechless

and the post credit scene will make you so much more excited in the future film of mcu
Best movie in my life definitely recommend it

Kudos to Feige, the Russos, and McFeely + Markus. This movie is a triumph and arguably the best CBM put to screen. An achievement in balance with brilliant moments of levity, stakes, and storytelling. A wonderful tribute to 10 years of excellence.
The Empire Strikes Back of the MCU.  That grand of a movie.
The greatest movie I have ever seen by far.
I like the new direction Marvel is going (if my guess is correct)! Awesome movie!
It's an amazing movie! People can't ben disappointed. I'm stopping here, Thanos demands my silence.

Very refreshing movie. The way the characters interact was perfect (ex: Iron Man and Dr. Strange’s egos causing them to disagree). Thanos is the best villain seen in a movie in a long time, he’s not just a bad guy because he’s “bad”. He actually thinks he’s the good guy in his story. The music was on point. And they showcased a large line up of hero’s without it ever feeling like it was too much. Possibly the best MCU movie to date and defiantly in the top five.

One word about the movie - EPIC
Don't let the bad reviews intimidate you perception about the movie guys. Infinity war promises everything a marvel fan has in mind i.e, humour, action and most importantly much darker emotions.
Better than Avengers 1!   ALOT to handle but in the end this movies satisfies and gratifies!  THANK YOU MARVEL
